bibl.title: An Erik von Scherling papyrus in Copenhagen
bibl.seg: Klaas A. Worp, An Erik von Scherling Papyrus in Copenhagen.

Offered for sale by Erik von Scherling in 1954 and subsequently acquired by the papyrus collection in Copenhagen. Repayment of a loan. Arsinoite Nome, September 17 (?), 91 CE. - Pp. 109-110: Appendix: Papyri offered for sale by Erik von Scherling which resurfaced after 2012.
bibl.note: Offered for sale by Erik von Scherling in 1954 and subsequently acquired by the papyrus collection in Copenhagen. Repayment of a loan. Arsinoite Nome, September 17 (?), 91 CE. - Pp. 109-110: Appendix: Papyri offered for sale by Erik von Scherling which resurfaced after 2012.
